episodes.title: SNEAK PEEK: Amanda Jokes About Cult Comment: "Next Time" | RHOBH After Show (S15 E8) Part 1 | Bravo
episodes.description:
On The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills Season 15 Episode 8, Amanda Frances reacts to Dorit Kemsley's cult comment, and teases it's a story for her next book. Plus, Dorit opens up about her friendship with Kyle Richards, and admits to feeling "s--t on." Watch new episodes of The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills, Thursdays at 8/7c on Bravo and stream next day on Peacock.

SNEAK PEEK: RHOBH 'Wives On Mau's DJ Hobby: "Cute" | RHOBH After Show (S15 E08) Part 2 | Bravo

About The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills:
This season the ladies of Beverly Hills jet set across the globe. They strengthen their bonds and indulge along the way, but the highs prove temporary. Beneath the gloss and glamour, old wounds reopen as shifting alliances take shape and the women find that loyalty is never guaranteed in the picturesque 90210. 
 
Kyle Richards is in the midst of juggling both a wedding and a separation. All the while, Kyle is moving forward, leaving behind the rumors and speculation surrounding her personal life over the past few years.   
 
After navigating years of personal hurdles, Erika Jayne has reclaimed her story and is open to finding a new man that will mark the beginning of her next chapter. When another lawsuit hits the headlines, it threatens to set back her progress. 
 
Dorit Kemsley is focused on picking up the pieces as she faces a very public divorce while learning how to navigate her finances and regain control of her life. As she aims to rebuild her friendship with Kyle, Dorit finds support in new housewife Rachel Zoe.  
 
Sutton Stracke tries on her maiden name for size this year when her ex-husband asks for an annulment. After fallouts with a former bestie and her trusted assistant, Sutton sees this as an opportunity to reinvent herself with a bold new name and fresh start with the group.  
 
Bozoma Saint John’s personal life is flourishing. After deciding to embark on their IVF journey, she and partner Keely are working to build a strong foundation together, starting with a new home and an official engagement.  
 
No stranger to the glitz of Beverly Hills, Rachel Zoe is introduced to the group through her longtime friend and neighbor Kathy Hilton. Rachel is embracing her new freedom while navigating a divorce from her husband, who also happens to be her longtime business partner. 
   
Amanda Frances is new to Beverly Hills and so is her money. The self-professed “money queen” has built a coaching empire and manifested her way into a fairytale life. When the other ladies start to dig deeper, they find that not everything is as picture perfect as it seems. 
 
Friends Kathy Hilton and Jennifer Tilly return with their socialite statuses to bring a fabulous mix of extravagance and levity to the season. Expert to the finer things in life, luxury brand consultant and entrepreneur Natalie Swanston Fuller also joins the group. 

Cast:
Kyle Richards
Erika Jayne
Dorit Kemsley
Sutton Stracke
Bozoma St. John
Rachel Zoe
Amanda Frances
Kathy Hilton
Jennifer Tilly
Natalie Swanston Fuller

About Bravo:   
Bravo is the premier lifestyle and entertainment brand that drives cultural conversation around its high-quality, interactive original content across all platforms. The network has a diverse slate of original programming that includes unscripted favorites such as Emmy Award-winning “Top Chef” and “Project Runway,” “Vanderpump Rules,” “Below Deck,” “Southern Charm,” and the popular “Million Dollar Listing” and “The Real Housewives” franchises. Bravo also boasts the only live late-night talk show on television with the critically acclaimed “Watch What Happens Live with Andy Cohen,” which has become a nightly destination for A-list celebrities.
